original: Bohm, Carl Georg, redaktör,__ Vänersborg, f. 4/2/04 i Grinstad, Älvsb. 1., av M. B. o. Kristina Jansson. G. 45 m. Ruth Dahlin. — Journ. o. litt. verksamh. 30-37, bidr. t. tidn. o. tid-skr. Medarb. i Elfsb. L. Annonsbl. fr. 38. Medl. av Vänersb. schack-sällsk. (sekr. fr. 42), Sv. journ :fören.. Dals konst- o. litt:kl., Vänersb :log. av Vasaorden.
translated: Bohm, Carl Georg, editor,__ Vänersborg, b. 4/2/04 in Grinstad, Älvsb. county, son of M. B. and Kristina Jansson. Married in 1945 to Ruth Dahlin. Worked in journalism and literature between 1930-1937 and contributed to newspapers and magazines. Collaborated with Elfsb. L. Annonsbl. from 1938. Member of Vänersb. chess society (secretary from 1942), Swedish Journalist Association, Dals art and literature club, Vänersb. log. of the Vasa Order.

memberOf.name: Vänersb. log. of the Vasa Order
